Sending payment request, please wait...
Sending payment request. Email will be sent to {digitalPaymentTenderItem.emailAddress}. Please wait…

Getting payment transaction result, please wait...
Getting payment transaction result, please wait...
The transaction failed to complete. Transaction timed out and has been cancelled.
The transaction failed to complete. Cancelled by the operator.

The refund transaction failed to complete. {enactor:empty(digitalPaymentTenderItem.errorMessage) ? "" : digitalPaymentTenderItem.errorMessage}
